overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement varies by platform, with LinkedIn showing the highest interactions per post. The content primarily revolves around research in social media analysis, disinformation, and academic opportunities.
